forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. High 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 40F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Low 3C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Low 38F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 39F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers late. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 49F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Clear skies later. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow flurries and snow showers possible before midnight. Becoming clear later. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny in the morning. Increasing clouds with showers later in the day. High 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
